meanings.definition: A structure used for storing corn.
meanings.sent1: The farmer stored his corn in the old corncribs.
meanings.sent2: The corncribs on the farm were filled with golden corn.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoons thought the corncribs were a fun maze to explore.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a corncrib of memories, each one neatly stored away.
meanings.sent5: The corncribs stood tall like guardians of the harvest, protecting the precious corn within.

meanings.sent1: The countryside was dotted with small corncribs.
meanings.sent2: The farmers built new corncribs to store the abundant harvest.
meanings.sent3: The children played hide-and-seek among the corncribs, giggling as they hid.
meanings.sent4: The corncribs lined up in rows, resembling soldiers standing at attention.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of corn wafted from the corncribs, tempting all who passed by.
